words: Suzi -wa isya -de kanojo -wa sensee -demoaru
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop.Conj she -Top teacher -Cop.Additive
translation: Susie is a doctor and she is a teacher.

words: Suzi -wa isya -de katsu sensee -demoaru
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop.Conj katsu teacher -Cop.Additive
translation: Susie is a doctor and she is a teacher.
comment: All the connectives in (2) are possible.

words: Suzi -wa isya -de mata sensee -demoaru
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop.Conj mata teacher -Cop.Additive
translation: Susie is a doctor and she is a teacher.
comment: All the connectives in (2) are possible.

words: Suzi -wa isya -de soshite sensee -demoaru
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop.Conj soshite teacher -Cop.Additive
translation: Susie is a doctor and she is a teacher.
comment: All the connectives in (2) are possible.

words: Suzi -wa isya -de sorekara sensee -demoaru
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop.Conj sorekara teacher -Cop.Additive
translation: Susie is a doctor and she is a teacher.
comment: All the connectives in (2) are possible.

words: Poru -wa terebi -o mi -teiru -shi syatsu -ni airon -o kaket -eiru
glosses: Paul -Top TV -Acc see -Asp -Conj shirt -Dat iron -Acc put.on -Asp
translation: Paul is watching TV and he is ironing his shirts.

words: Poru -wa terebi -o mi -teiru -shi mata syatsu -ni airon -o kaket -eiru
glosses: Paul -Top TV -Acc see -Asp -Conj mata shirt -Dat iron -Acc put.on -Asp
translation: Paul is watching TV and he is ironing his shirts.
comment: bit strange for register reasons, sentence-final particles would be added

words: Suzi -wa isya -da -ga kanojo -wa binboo -da
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop -but she -Top poor -Cop
translation: Susie is a doctor but she is poor.
comment: Ga has the implication that there is a contrast.

words: Suzi -wa isya -da -ga shikashi kanojo -wa binboo -da
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop -but shikashi she -Top poor -Cop
translation: Susie is a doctor but she is poor.

words: Suzi -wa isya -da -ga tokoroga kanojo -wa binboo -da
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop -but tokoroga she -Top poor -Cop
translation: Susie is a doctor but she is poor.
comment: These extra coordinators are optional. Tokoroga, more formal.

words: Suzi -wa isya -da -ga demo kanojo -wa binboo -da
glosses: Suzi -Top doctor -Cop -but demo she -Top poor -Cop
translation: Susie is a doctor but she is poor.
comment: These extra coordinators are optional. Demo, less formal.

words: Jen -wa aisu -o katta -ga kanojo -wa sore -o shiranai hito -ni age -ta
glosses: Jen -Top ice.cream -Acc bought -GA she -Top it -Acc unknown person -Dat give -Past
translation: Jen bought ice cream but she bought it for a stranger.

words: Jen -wa aisu -o katta -ga shikashi kanojo -wa sore -o shiranai hito -ni age -ta
glosses: Jen -Top ice.cream -Acc bought -GA shikashi she -Top it -Acc unknown person -Dat give -Past
translation: Jen bought ice cream but she bought it for a stranger.

words: Jen -wa aisu -o katta -ga tokoroga kanojo -wa sore -o shiranai hito -ni age -ta
glosses: Jen -Top ice.cream -Acc bought -GA tokoroga she -Top it -Acc unknown person -Dat give -Past
translation: Jen bought ice cream but she bought it for a stranger.

words: Jen -wa aisu -o katta -ga demo kanojo -wa sore -o shiranai hito -ni age -ta
glosses: Jen -Top ice.cream -Acc bought -GA demo she -Top it -Acc unknown person -Dat give -Past
translation: Jen bought ice cream but she bought it for a stranger.

words: Poru -wa isya -de -wa -nai -ga kare -wa uketsuke -da
glosses: Paul -Top doctor -Cop -Top -Neg -GA he -Top reception -Cop
translation: Paul is not a doctor but he is a receptionist.

words: Jen -wa aisu -o kaw -ana -katta -ga kanojo -wa tyoko -o kat -ta
glosses: Jen -Top ice -Acc buy -Neg -Past -GA she -Top chocolate -Acc buy -Past
translation: Jen didn’t buy ice cream but she bought chocolate.

words: Mondai -no kotae -wa A ka sono kotae -wa B -da
glosses: Question -Gen answer -Top A KA its answer -Top B -Cop
translation: (Either) the answer to the question is A or the answer to the question is B.

words: Mondai -no kotae -wa A ka sono kotae -wa B -ka -da
glosses: Question -Gen answer -Top A KA its answer -Top B -KA -Cop
translation: (Either) the answer to the question is A or the answer to the question is B.

words: Mondai -no kotae -wa A ka matawa sono kotae -wa B -da
glosses: Question -Gen answer -Top A KA or its answer -Top B -Cop
translation: (Either) the answer to the question is A or the answer to the question is B.

words: Mondai -no kotae -wa A ka matawa sono kotae -wa B -ka -da
glosses: Question -Gen answer -Top A KA or its answer -Top B -KA -Cop
translation: (Either) the answer to the question is A or the answer to the question is B.

words: Poru -ga isya -ka John -ga isya -da
glosses: Paul -Nom doctor -KA John -Nom doctor -Cop
translation: (Either) Paul is a doctor or John is a doctor.

words: Poru -ga isya -ka John -ga isya -ka -da
glosses: Paul -Nom doctor -KA John -Nom doctor -KA -Cop
translation: (Either) Paul is a doctor or John is a doctor.

words: Poru -ga isya -ka matawa John -ga isya -da
glosses: Paul -Nom doctor -KA or John -Nom doctor -Cop
translation: (Either) Paul is a doctor or John is a doctor.
comment: problem with the sentence itself (syntax), doubling of “ka” with “matawa” preferred

words: Poru -ga isya -ka matawa John -ga isya -ka -da
glosses: Paul -Nom doctor -KA or John -Nom doctor -KA -Cop
translation: (Either) Paul is a doctor or John is a doctor.

words: Watashi -wa shigotoba -ni denwa -o wasureta -ka kaeru tochuu -de pro otoshita
glosses: I -Top work.place -Dat phone -Acc forgot -KA return middle -Loc pro dropped
translation: I left my phone at work or dropped it on my way home.

words: Watashi -wa shigotoba -ni denwa -o wasureta -ka matawa kaeru tochuu -de pro otoshita
glosses: I -Top work.place -Dat phone -Acc forgot -KA or return middle -Loc pro dropped
translation: I left my phone at work or dropped it on my way home.

words: Jon -wa ima isya -ka sakka -da
glosses: John -Top now doctor -KA writer -Cop
translation: John is a doctor or he is a writer now.

words: Jon -wa ima isya -ka sakka -ka -da
glosses: John -Top now doctor -KA writer -KA -Cop
translation: John is a doctor or he is a writer now.

words: Jon -wa ima isya -ka matawa sakka -da
glosses: John -Top now doctor -KA or writer -Cop
translation: John is a doctor or he is a writer now.

words: Jon -wa ima isya -ka matawa sakka -ka -da
glosses: John -Top now doctor -KA or writer -KA -Cop
translation: John is a doctor or he is a writer now.

words: Denwa -wa shigotoba -ni wasure -mashita -ka, basu -ni wasure -mashita -ka?
glosses: phone -Top work.place -Dat forget -pol.Past -Q bus -Dat forget -pol.Past -Q
translation: Did you leave your phone at work or did you leave it on the bus?
comment: Difference is in politeness. B) is polite.

words: Denwa -wa shigotoba -ni wasure -mashita -ka, soretomo basu -ni wasure -mashita -ka?
glosses: phone -Top work.place -Dat forget -pol.Past -Q or bus -Dat forget -pol.Past -Q
translation: Did you leave your phone at work or did you leave it on the bus?
comment: Difference is in politeness. B) is polite.

words: Mise A -ga kono burando -o oite -imasu -ka Mise B -ga kono burando -o oite -imasu -ka
glosses: Shop A -Nom this brand -Acc deal.with -Pol -Q shop B -Nom this brand -Acc deal.with -Pol -Q

words: Mise A -ga kono burando -o oite -imasu -ka soretomo Mise B -ga kono burando -o oite -imasu -ka
glosses: Shop A -Nom this brand -Acc deal.with -Pol -Q or shop B -Nom this brand -Acc deal.with -Pol -Q
translation: Would Shop A sell this brand or would Shop B sell this brand?

words: Poru -wa isya -de -mo nai -shi mata kangoshi -de -mo nai
glosses: Paul -Top doctor -Cop -Additive Neg -SHI mata nurse -Cop -Additive Neg
translation: Paul is neither a doctor nor is he a nurse.

translation: Paul is neither a doctor nor is he a nurse.
